attributes.action: No TV licence fee until the BBC follows public will
attributes.additional_details:
It is time the BBC started to listen to what the majority, indigenous Christian heritage population of the country, not them imposing their Politically Correct views on us, about thing which no-one is offended (BCE and CE instead of AD and BC, how pathetic).

If they offend the everyday person, then we should be able to opt out of paying for the licence fee until they begin listening to what the majority wants.
